FINANCIAL SERVICES
BetaEpsilon helps financial services companies to create & improve their decision process. Using our Model builder & decision optimizer tool, we can
  1. Build better models using cutting edge data science techniques to predict customer Risk & profitability
  2. Improve customer underwriting strategy
  3. Improve existing customer & collection strategies
  4. Create real time fraud detection model & strategy
BetaEpsilon also helps financial services companies the simplest way to translate messy data into analytical insight and produce financial dashboards and reports. Using our Business insight tool, you can
  1. Monitor cash flow, revenue, and expenses across the organization
  2. Streamline your financial planning and balance sheet
  3. Analyze risks and opportunities
  4. Create reports,insight and alerts for monitoring your portfolio
